channel.title: What all do I need to do to make a VPS?
channel.description: My friend is getting a new laptop, and we have agreed that he could host the server for us. But I was wondering what he'd need. Would it just be my source files, or some other things?

item.title: What all do I need to do to make a VPS?
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

And through all of these replies, my question has yet to be answered.

Read full topic
item.source: What all do I need to do to make a VPS?

item.title: What all do I need to do to make a VPS?
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

LOL. I’m ‘old-school’. Plus, I’m running XP, with practically nothing installed, so I only need 512mb of RAM. I’m surprised we haven’t been banned by moparscape’s mods for ‘SPAMing’.

Read full topic
item.source: What all do I need to do to make a VPS?

item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Syrillia:

Haha. I use this computer only for internet and programming. My other pc is 2GB ram and dual core, so that’s my server/web host.

My “Wreck pc” is a laptop with Dual core also and 3gb of ram

Read full topic

item.source: What all do I need to do to make a VPS?

item.title: What all do I need to do to make a VPS?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Syrillia:

^^ Of course you can. A server (in terms of computers) is simply a computer that is specifically used to hosting files/running programs. If you’re buying a laptop specifically for hosting a server and nothing else, you need only 512MB RAM and pretty much any old processor, as the server side of things uses very little space and memory. The only thing you WILL require, to keep lag to a minimum is decent internet speeds.

I guess you’re right, but i wouldn’t use a laptop for hosting. There was a computer at futureshop for 1.3k CAD with 12gb of ram and quad etc, it was so beautiful, i plan on hosting a few servers on that, (CS:S, 1.6, CZ, warcraft) etc.

Read full topic
item.source: What all do I need to do to make a VPS?

You can’t “make a vps” you have to purchase one monthly, if you want one, go to www.vpsland.com

Read full topic
